main: ^Greetings, handsome young one! I am the fortune teller of these lands, the one who knows all that can be known.
^I have gazed into your future, and your path is entwined with mysteries yet to be unraveled.
choose: ^What truths do you wish to uncover? Ask your question.
no: ^I do not believe in the visions of fortune teller. I choose not to ask you any questions.
aile_question: ^Tell me about my family—where are they? What fate has befallen them?
medeniyet_question: ^What can you tell me about the ancient civilization of this land? I'm wondering, is it possible to save this civilization?
aile_answer: ^Do you seek the truth about your parents, or would you rather uncover the story of the grandfather who set you on this path?
medeniyet_answer: ^This question can only be answered by the master of the labyrinth. I'm afraid this is beyond my knowledge—my apologies.
dede_answer: ^Your grandfather's story is a tale of tragedy and mystery. He vanished without a trace, his fate entangled with the secrets of the labyrinth.
^His knowledge of the lost civilization haunted him, leading him down a dangerous path from which he never returned.
annebaba_answer: ^Your parents vanished after a tragic car accident, and their bodies were never found.
^Your grandfather believed their disappearance was linked to the mysteries of the labyrinth, but he couldn't convince others of his suspicions.
